subject: Suits and Litigation
Pain-Relieving Drugs
Football
Concussions
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: A dozen retired players contend that teams repeatedly administered the painkiller Toradol to them — worsening high-risk injuries like concussions — and failed to warn them of the consequences.
snippet: A dozen retired players contend that teams repeatedly administered the painkiller Toradol to them — worsening high-risk injuries like concussions — and failed to warn them of the consequences.
